The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserAutomatorTask] class is intended to run Automator workflows from your application. It is intended to execute user-supplied workflows, and will execute them outside of the application’s sandbox, if any.

# NSUserAutomatorTask

**Class**

An object that executes Automator workflows.

## Declaration

```swift
class NSUserAutomatorTask
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserAutomatorTask] class is intended to run Automator workflows from your application. It is intended to execute user-supplied workflows, and will execute them outside of the application’s sandbox, if any.

The class is not intended to execute scripts built into an application; for that, use one of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Process] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Automator/AMWorkflow] classes.  If the application is sandboxed, then the script must be in the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileManager/SearchPathDirectory/applicationScriptsDirectory] folder.  A sandboxed application may read from, but not write to, this folder.

If you simply need to execute scripts without regard to input or output, use [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserScriptTask], which can execute any of the specific types.  If you need specific control over the input to or output from the workflow, use this class.

## Executing Automator Tasks

- **execute(withInput:completionHandler:)**: Execute the Automator workflow by providing it as securely coded input.
- **variables**: The variables required by the Automator workflow.

## Constants

- **NSUserAutomatorTask.CompletionHandler**: Implement this block to retrieve the output of the Automator workflow executed by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserAutomatorTask/execute(withInput:completionHandler:)].

## Scripts and External Tasks

- **Process**: An object that represents a subprocess of the current process.
- **NSUserScriptTask**: An object that executes scripts.
- **NSUserAppleScriptTask**: An object that executes AppleScript scripts.
- **NSUserUnixTask**: An object that executes unix applications.

## Inherits From

- NSUserScriptTask

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
